languages.text: When the psyker uses a {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic power{/g}, all enemies adjacent to the psyker suffer {uip|Damage|8e85511b779e41548d0b57635ecfd4db} {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g}. The same also happens when the psyker suffers damage from {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}, or {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attacks{/g}.
languages.original_text: Когда псайкер использует {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}психосилу{/g}, все противники на соседних клетках получают {uip|Damage|8e85511b779e41548d0b57635ecfd4db} {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}прямого урона{/g}. Также это происходит, когда псайкер получает урон от {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}горения{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}кровотечения{/g} или атак в {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}ближнем бою{/g}.

traits.locale_text: When the Psyker uses a psychic power, all enemies adjacent to the Psyker suffer <u>(psy rating)</u> direct damage. The same happens when the Psyker suffers damage from burning, bleeding, or melee attacks.

When the psyker uses a psychic power, all enemies adjacent to the psyker suffer <u>psy rating</u> direct damage. The same also happens when the psyker suffers damage from burning, bleeding, or melee attacks.

When the psyker uses a {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic power{/g}, all enemies adjacent to the psyker suffer {uip|Damage|8e85511b779e41548d0b57635ecfd4db} {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g}. The same also happens when the psyker suffers damage from {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}, or {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attacks{/g}.

Также это происходит, когда псайкер получает урон от {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}горения{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}кровотечения{/g} или атак в {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}ближнем бою{/g}.
languages.original_text: When the psyker uses a {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic power{/g}, all enemies adjacent to the psyker suffer {uip|Damage|8e85511b779e41548d0b57635ecfd4db} {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g}. The same also happens when the psyker suffers damage from {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}, or {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attacks{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Когда псайкер использует психосилу, все противники на соседних клетках получают <u>пси-рейтинг</u> прямого урона. Также это происходит, когда псайкер получает урон от горения, кровотечения или атак в ближнем бою.

Когда псайкер использует психосилу, все противники на соседних клетках получают <u>пси-рейтинг</u> прямого урона. Также это происходит, когда псайкер получает урон от горения, кровотечения или атак в ближнем бою.

Когда псайкер использует психосилу, все противники на соседних клетках получают {uip|Damage|8e85511b779e41548d0b57635ecfd4db} прямого урона. Также это происходит, когда псайкер получает урон от горения, кровотечения или атак в ближнем бою.

languages.text: 当灵能者使用{g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}灵能能力{/g}时，所有与灵能者相邻的敌人都会受到{uip|Damage|8e85511b779e41548d0b57635ecfd4db}点{g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}直击伤害{/g}。当灵能者受到{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}灼烧{/g}伤害、{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}流血{/g}伤害或{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近战攻击{/g}伤害时，也同样会对相邻敌人造成伤害。
languages.original_text: When the psyker uses a {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic power{/g}, all enemies adjacent to the psyker suffer {uip|Damage|8e85511b779e41548d0b57635ecfd4db} {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g}. The same also happens when the psyker suffers damage from {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}, or {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attacks{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 当灵能者使用灵能能力时，所有与灵能者相邻的敌人都会受到直击伤害，数值等同于<u>灵能等级</u>。当灵能者受到灼烧伤害、流血伤害或{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近战攻击{/g}伤害时，也同样会对相邻敌人造成伤害。
当灵能者使用灵能能力时，所有与灵能者相邻的敌人都会受到直击伤害，数值等同于{uip|Damage|8e85511b779e41548d0b57635ecfd4db}。当灵能者受到灼烧伤害、流血伤害或{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近战攻击{/g}伤害时，也同样会对相邻敌人造成伤害。

当灵能者使用{g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}灵能能力{/g}时，所有与灵能者相邻的敌人都会受到{uip|Damage|8e85511b779e41548d0b57635ecfd4db}点{g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}直击伤害{/g}。当灵能者受到{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}灼烧{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}流血{/g}伤害或{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近战攻击{/g}伤害时，也同样会对相邻敌人造成伤害。

languages.text: Cuando el psíquico utiliza un {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}poder psíquico{/g}, todos los enemigos adyacentes a él sufren {uip|Damage|8e85511b779e41548d0b57635ecfd4db} de {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}daño directo{/g}. Lo mismo ocurre cuando el psíquico sufre daño por {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}quemadura{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}hemorragia{/g} o recibir {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}ataques cuerpo a cuerpo{/g}.
languages.original_text: When the psyker uses a {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic power{/g}, all enemies adjacent to the psyker suffer {uip|Damage|8e85511b779e41548d0b57635ecfd4db} {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g}. The same also happens when the psyker suffers damage from {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}, or {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attacks{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Cuando el psíquico utiliza un {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}poder psíquico{/g}, todos los enemigos adyacentes a él sufren {uip|Damage|8e85511b779e41548d0b57635ecfd4db} de {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}daño directo{/g}. Lo mismo ocurre cuando el psíquico sufre {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} por {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}arder{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}desangrarse{/g} o recibir {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}ataques cuerpo a cuerpo{/g}.

Cuando el psíquico utiliza un poder psíquico, todos los enemigos adyacentes a él sufren {uip|Damage|8e85511b779e41548d0b57635ecfd4db} de daño directo. Lo mismo ocurre cuando el psíquico sufre daño por arder, desangrarse o recibir {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}ataques cuerpo a cuerpo{/g}.

languages.text: Wenn der Psioniker eine {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psionische Kraft{/g} einsetzt, erleiden alle Feinde in der Nähe des Psionikers {uip|Damage|8e85511b779e41548d0b57635ecfd4db} {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}Direktschaden{/g}. Das Gleiche geschieht, wenn der Psioniker durch {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Verbrennung{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}Blutung{/g} oder {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}Nahkampfangriffe{/g} Schaden erleidet.
languages.original_text: When the psyker uses a {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic power{/g}, all enemies adjacent to the psyker suffer {uip|Damage|8e85511b779e41548d0b57635ecfd4db} {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g}. The same also happens when the psyker suffers damage from {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}, or {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attacks{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Wenn der Psioniker eine {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psionische Kraft{/g} einsetzt, erleiden alle Feinde in der Nähe des Psionikers {uip|Damage|8e85511b779e41548d0b57635ecfd4db} {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}Direktschaden{/g}. Das Gleiche geschieht, wenn der Psioniker durch {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Verbrennung{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}Blutung{/g} oder {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}Nahkampfangriffe{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} erleidet.

Wenn der Psioniker eine psionische Kraft einsetzt, erleiden alle Gegner in der Nähe des Psionikers {uip|Damage|8e85511b779e41548d0b57635ecfd4db} direkten Schaden. Das Gleiche geschieht, wenn der Psioniker durch Verbrennung, Blutung oder {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}Nahkampfangriffe{/g} Schaden erleidet.

languages.text: Lorsque le psyker utilise un {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}pouvoir psychique{/g}, tous les ennemis adjacents subissent {uip|Damage|8e85511b779e41548d0b57635ecfd4db} points de {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}dégâts directs{/g}. Idem lorsque le psyker subit des dégâts de {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}combustion{/g}, de {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}saignement{/g} ou des {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}attaques de mêlée{/g}.
languages.original_text: When the psyker uses a {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic power{/g}, all enemies adjacent to the psyker suffer {uip|Damage|8e85511b779e41548d0b57635ecfd4db} {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g}. The same also happens when the psyker suffers damage from {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}, or {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attacks{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Lorsque le psyker utilise un pouvoir psychique, tous les ennemis adjacents subissent des dégâts directs liés à l'<u>indice psy</u>. Idem lorsque le psyker subit des dégâts de combustion, de saignement ou des {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}attaques de mêlée{/g}.

Lorsque le psyker utilise un pouvoir psychique, tous les ennemis adjacents subissent des dégâts directs liés à l'{uip|Damage|8e85511b779e41548d0b57635ecfd4db}. Idem lorsque le psyker subit des dégâts de combustion, de saignement ou des {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}attaques de mêlée{/g}.

languages.text: この異能者が{g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}サイキック・パワー{/g}を使用した時、隣接するすべての敵は{uip|Damage|8e85511b779e41548d0b57635ecfd4db}分の{g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}直接ダメージ{/g}を受ける。この異能者が{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}炎上{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}出血{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近接攻撃{/g}でダメージを受けた時も、同様の効果が発生する。
languages.original_text: When the psyker uses a {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic power{/g}, all enemies adjacent to the psyker suffer {uip|Damage|8e85511b779e41548d0b57635ecfd4db} {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g}. The same also happens when the psyker suffers damage from {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}, or {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attacks{/g}.

traits.locale_text: この異能者が{g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}サイキック・パワー{/g}を使用した時、隣接するすべての敵は{uip|Damage|8e85511b779e41548d0b57635ecfd4db}分の{g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}直接ダメージ{/g}を受ける。この異能者が{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}炎上{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}出血{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近接攻撃{/g}でダメージを受けた時も、同様の効果が発生する。
この異能者が超能力を使用した時、隣接するすべての敵は{uip|Damage|8e85511b779e41548d0b57635ecfd4db}分の直接ダメージを受ける。この異能者が炎上、出血、{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近接攻撃{/g}でダメージを受けた時も、同様の効果が発生する。

この異能者が{g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}超能力{/g}を使用した時、隣接するすべての敵は{uip|Damage|8e85511b779e41548d0b57635ecfd4db}分の{g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}直接ダメージ{/g}を受ける。この異能者が{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}炎上{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}出血{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近接攻撃{/g}で{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を受けた時も、同様の効果が発生する。

languages.text: Ruhsezer bir {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}ruhsezi gücü{/g} kullandığında onun bitişiğinde olan tüm düşmanlar, {uip|Damage|8e85511b779e41548d0b57635ecfd4db} {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}doğrudan hasara{/g} maruz kalırlar. Aynısı; ruhsezer {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}yanma{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}kanama{/g} veya {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}yakın dövüş saldırısı{/g} sebebiyle hasar aldığında da gerçekleşir.
languages.original_text: When the psyker uses a {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic power{/g}, all enemies adjacent to the psyker suffer {uip|Damage|8e85511b779e41548d0b57635ecfd4db} {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g}. The same also happens when the psyker suffers damage from {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}, or {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attacks{/g}.
